attributes.additional_details: I want to see how my brother is taken care of in Supported Living. I have worked in a residential care home and whistle blown on staff. I've worked with Mencap and been an Asst Team Manager for adults with LD. I have a psychology degree and get fed up with the lack of care in homes for vulnerable people. We all MUST make a change. That's with anyone vulnerable, the elderly very much in my thoughts. People rant on about privacy issues, ASK THE FAMILY!!! Fed up of people thinking they know better. We don't put family members into care homes through abuse SO STOP MAKING FAMILY FEEL LIKE THEY HAVE DONE SOMETHING WRONG!!! MP'S TAKE NOTE.

rejection.details: Please see: WE NEED CCTV IN CARE HOMES AND NURSING HOMES TO PROTECT THE SERVICE USER AND WORKER
